=== An update from the Forums Council for May 2015 ===

==== Wireless Script ====

A Github account has been set up for the wireless script used on the forum. you can find it <nowiki>[[https://github.com/UbuntuForums/wireless-info/raw/master/wireless-info|here]]</nowiki>.

==== Moderation Team ====

Nomination cycle started via nominations from Ubuntu Members with forum contributions. You can find the announcement <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2276527|here]]</nowiki>.

==== New Ubuntu Member via forums contributions ====

We are happy to announce <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/member.php?u=628319|sammiev]]</nowiki> has been granted Ubuntu membership during the May 3rd Forums Council meeting. The process is outlined in the forums thread <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1750642|here]]</nowiki> and wiki <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Forums/Membership|there]]</nowiki>.

==== Call for Moderation Team ====

Once more we ran a nomination period for this. Once again it was all for naught.

Should you wish to add items to the agenda here is the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ForumCouncilAgenda|link]]</nowiki>.
